Subjects: hymns, to Virgin Mary and Christ; Virgin Mary and Christ, songs/prayers to
_description: A macaronic hymn to the Virgin Mary and Christ — six 10-line stanzas

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Seinte mari moder milde mater salutarisfeirest flour of eni
                    felde uere nuncuparis…
